title: Finance ministry scraps import duty on cotton - The Financial Express
content: Finance ministry scraps import duty on cotton  The Financial Express
description: Prices of the commonly used cotton variety have more than doubled to breach the Rs 90,000-mark per candy of 356 kg since February 2021 when an import duty was raised. Local cotton prices have also exceeded global rates by as much as Rs 1,500-2,000 per quintal.
